```{python}
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv()

from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()
model = "claude-sonnet-4-5"
```

```{python}
message = client.messages.create(
    model=model,
    max_tokens=1000,
    messages=[
        {
            "role": "user",
            "content": "What is quantum computing? Answer in one sentence"
        }
    ]
)

message.content[0].text
```
